title: Tyra Banks looks fierce in business black as she attends the Nine West Pop-Up Experience in NYC
text:
She has been in the modeling business for 30 years.

So Tyra Banks certainly has the fierce face down, as was evident by her various poses at the Nine West Pop-Up Experience in New York City.

The 45-year-old suited up in business black for the fashion event, which took place on Wednesday.

Making an appearance: Tyra Banks, 45, attended the Nine West Pop-Up Experience in New York City on Wednesday

Tyra layered a black corset underneath a matching blazer.

The mother-of-one added a pair of tapered trousers and heeled ankle boots to her look, before accessorizing with fingerless gloves and a backpack.

The gorgeous brunette wore her medium-length hair down, and showed off smokey eye make-up.

She's got this! Tyra certainly has the fierce face down, as she has been in the modeling business for 30 years

Her look: The Next Top Model host layered a black corset underneath a matching blazer

The business mogul, who's been in the modeling business since she was 15, is also a mother to son York Banks Asla, three.

She shares her little one with ex-boyfriend Erik Asla, a 55-year-old Norwegian photographer.

Erik is also a father to daughters Tatum and Asla.

Topping it off: Tyra added a pair of tapered trousers and heeled ankle boots to her look

Evening glam: The gorgeous brunette wore her medium-length hair down, and showed off smokey eye make-up

In an episode of TV One's Uncensored, Tyra spoke abut a previous bad relationship, but did not disclose to whom she was referring to.

'I remember being kind of judgmental for women that were in bad relationships. And I'm just like, "Get out. Come on, like what are you doing? Just leave him! I don't get it." Until I experienced it myself,' she began.

'I was in a relationship for many years, and we probably broke up 14 [or] 15 times. There were things that he said and made me feel like, I couldn't leave, or if I left I had to go back.

He told me that that is what he does. That he knows how to break a woman down. And it took so many different friends and family for me to finally say goodbye to him,' she said.
description: She has been in the modeling business for 30 years. So Tyra Banks certainly has the fierce face down, as was evident by her poses at the Nine West Pop-Up Experience in New York City.
